options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs hunting queries for MicrosoftDefenderForEndpoint that you can run in Microsoft Sentinel. These hunting queries will be deployed in the Hunting gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Run these hunting queries to hunt for threats in the Hunting gallery after this Solution deploys.

Identifies the host and account that executed AdFind by hash and filename in addition to common and unique flags that are used by many threat actors in discovery. It depends on the MicrosoftThreatProtection data connector and DeviceProcessEvents data type and MicrosoftThreatProtection parser.

Identifies suspicious child processes of SolarWinds.Orion.Core.BusinessLayer.dll that may be evidence of the SUNBURST backdoor It depends on the MicrosoftThreatProtection data connector and DeviceProcessEvents data type and MicrosoftThreatProtection parser.
